articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Leaves to Visit Vietnam and Laos
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Leaves to Visit Vietnam and Laos
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Saturday left here to pay official goodwill visits to Vietnam and Laos. 
					 He was accompanied by Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, Minister of Mining Industry Kang Min Chol, Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung and other suite members.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Arrive Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Arrive Here
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates from China, Singapore and Taipei of China arrived here by air on Friday and Saturday to take part in the 2012 Pyongyang Machine Equipment Exhibition.
					 A delegation of Italy arrived here earlier.

articles.title: DPRK Suffers Damage from Flood
articles.content:
DPRK Suffers Damage from Flood
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The flooding, triggered by typhoon and downpour, swept some areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea from late June to July 31, causing big human and material losses in the country.
					 According to data available, the flood left 169 people dead, 144 injured and 400 missing.
					
					 It also destroyed more than 8,600 dwelling houses totally or partially and submerged 43,770 houses in North and South Phyongan and Hamgyong provinces, Jagang Province and other areas, making 212,200 people homeless.
					
					 At least 65,280 hectares of cropland were washed away, buried and inundated across the country, including 23,400 hectares and 21,900 hectares respectively in North and South Phyongan provinces, 7,220 hectares and 5,670 hectares respectively in North and South Hamgyong provinces.
					
					 More than 1,400 educational, healthcare and factory buildings were collapsed and inundated, which cover 260,650 square meters.

articles.title: DPRK Women's Table Tennis Team Beats Its U.K. Rival 3:0
articles.content:
DPRK Women's Table Tennis Team Beats Its U.K. Rival 3:0
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women's table tennis team Friday downed its U.K. rival 3:0 in the first round of women's team event of the 30th London Olympics.

articles.title: Weightlifting Enthusiasm Runs High in DPRK
articles.content:
Weightlifting Enthusiasm Runs High in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Many youngsters, desirous of becoming weightlifters, are on increase in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, prompted by its weightlifters' successes at London Olympics.
					Kim Myong Ho, principal of the Tongrim County Juvenile Sports School, told KCNA:
					
					 "My school has turned out many worldwide weightlifting stars in the past scores of years.
					
					 Among them are world champions, People's Athlete Kim Myong Nam and Labor Hero and People's Athlete Ri Song Hui and a Beijing Olympic champion, People's Athlete Pak Hyon Suk.
					
					 Besides, tens of graduates set new weightlifting records at domestic competitions.
					
					 A number of youngsters and their parents are now calling at the school to apply for learning weightlifting from across the country."
					
					 Gold medals won by DPRK athletes at ongoing London Olympics have given big strength and courage to local sportspersons.
					
					 The prestige of weightlifting Olympic champions Om Yun Chol, Kim Un Guk and Rim Jong Sim is soaring high nowadays, kicking up weightlifting enthusiasm throughout the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Encourages DPRK People in Building Thriving Nation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Encourages DPRK People in Building Thriving Nation
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un published the work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step up the Building of a Prosperous Country".
					 His work has evoked big repercussions upon the servicepersons and civilians in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 Ro Kyong Hwan, a workshop head at the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 "Kim Jong Un in his work praised Kim Jong Il's patriotism as a genuine one that calls for regarding every blade of grass and tree of the country as one's own flesh and blood.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made a long journey of the arduous Songun revolution for the prosperity of the country and people's happiness, tiding over the grim difficulties.
					
					 His long journey of patriotic devotion helped face-lift the country.
					
					 Following Kim Jong Il's patriotism, I will devote all my life to the prosperity of the country."
					
					 Jong Hyon Su, an officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					 "The work made me keenly feel Marshal Kim Jong Un's intense fidelity to leader Kim Jong Il and noble outlook on the country, people and posterity. In the work he stressed that the greatest patriotism lies in defending the country.
					
					 I'll devote all my life to defending the Party and the leader, the country and the people with arms, true to his intention."
					
					 Kim Song Gun, a department director of the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation, said:
					
					 "His work is perfectly logical and exoteric. It tells us what attitude and stand we, officials, should take in the drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The work urges all the people to earnestly follow Kim Jong Il's patriotism so as to push ahead with the building of a powerful socialist nation with the might of patriotism and the single-minded unity.
					
					 I'll always take the lead in carrying into practice Kim Jong Il's patriotism."

articles.title: Foreign Students Enjoy Camping in DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Students Enjoy Camping in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren from various countries began their camping at the Songdowon International Children's Camp, located on the east coast of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 They spend pleasant times at the seaside with swimming, boating, sports and amusement games, etc, getting together.
					
					 A camper from China told KCNA:
					
					 "It is a big fortune for me to come here. I've got to know a lot of things about the culture and history of Korea.
					
					 I am thankful to respected Marshal Kim Jong Un for the loving care given to us campers."
					
					 A camper from Mongolia said:
					
					 "Days here in the camp are so enjoyable. This is the first time for me to see the sea.
					
					 It is very funny to play with campers from different countries. I want to come here again in the future." 
					
					 Hong Jin Hyok, a 13-year-old student at Kumsong Secondary School No.1, said:
					
					 "Now I feel refreshed after having a sea bathing
					
					 During the camping, I will further train my body and deepen my knowledge to be an able man for the country."

articles.title: Songdowon International Children's Camap
articles.content:
Songdowon International Children's Camp
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The Songdowon International Children's Camp is located at the seaside in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Songdowon stands for an area forested with pine trees. It is one of the tourist destinations on the east coast of Korea.
					
					 The camp is associated with the warm love of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for posterity.
					
					 The camp site was fixed personally by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It was in June Juche 48 (1959) when he was making a guidance tour of Kangwon Province.
					
					 Fascinated by the scenic beauty of Songdowon, the President suggested building a children's camp there. He said that children are kings in the DPRK and their camp should be built in such scenic spot.
					
					 Afterwards, he gave detailed tasks for building the camp, paying deep attention to the overall construction.
					
					 The camp began its operation on August 17, 1960.
					
					 The President sent to the camp color TV sets, tape recorders and musical instruments to ensure the happy life of the campers.
					
					 It was on March 30, 1993 when leader Kim Jong Il visited the newly-built Songdowon International Children's Camp.
					
					 He expressed satisfaction over the camp's location and acquainted himself with problems arising in managing the camp.
					
					 Later, he sent as gifts to the camp many facilities conducive to better the camping of schoolchildren.
					
					 The camp, with a total floor space of 40,000 square meters, can accommodate more than 1,200 campers in a shift.
					
					 The manager of the camp, Kim Gon, told KCNA:
					
					 "The camp houses over 220 bedrooms and International Friendship Juvenile Hall, music room, indoor swimming pool, wading pool, amusement facilities, boating ground and dancing hall.
					
					 The camp has accepted more than 350,000 campers up till now. Over ten thousands of them were students from other countries."

articles.title: Heads of Foreign Groups Give Impressions of Camping
articles.content:
Heads of Foreign Groups Give Impressions of Camping
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Groups of campers from different countries are now spending pleasant days at the Songdowon International Children's Camp in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					Heads of those groups told KCNA about their impressions in this regard. Hu Shui, a deputy section chief of the Nanjing Children's Palace of China, said on behalf of the Chinese juvenile camping group:
					
					 "The scenery of the camp is fantastic and temperature here is nice.
					
					 I was told that President Kim Il Sung personally chose this place for the camp. I would love to express thanks to him for it.
					
					 The current camping offers us an occasion to contact other campers from various countries and deepen friendship with them.
					
					 It will also provide those campers with an opportunity to get knowledge of culture and history of different nations and realize how valuable peace is.
					
					 I hope that the DPRK would further prosper under the guidance of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and that the friendship between China and the DPRK would grow healthier like the pine trees in Songdowon Park."
					
					 Nguyen Canh Chung, head of the Vietnamese campers' group, said:
					
					 "I am thankful for all kindness accorded to us.
					
					 We like sea bathing very much. The current camping will help promote friendship and solidarity among campers.
					
					 Camping is conducive to developing self-support among children.
					
					 I am convinced that this camping will bear desirable fruits since it is under the deep care of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un."
					
					 The head of the Russian campers' group, Kulkova Svetlana Apanasiyevna, said:
					
					 "This is the 13th time for us to attend the camping here.
					
					 Calling children kings of the country, President Kim Il Sung saw to it that the children's camp was built here.
					
					 Whenever visiting the DPRK, I would keenly feel that the government shows deep care for the children.
					
					 The campers from various countries will get acquainted with each other and familiar to each other's customs.
					
					 We feel very pleased to be here."

articles.title: County, Model in Local Economic Development
articles.content:
County, Model in Local Economic Development
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Changsong County, North Phyongan Province of the DPRK, has become a model in the development of local economy in the new century. Great changes have taken place in all aspects of production and construction in a matter of little over one year.
					 Local industrial factories have been placed on a modern and scientific basis to lay a firm foundation for reenergizing production and improving the standard of people's living. The county seat has taken on a new appearance to suit the specific features of a county.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung provided field guidance of devotion to the county, once known as remote mountainous county, more than a hundred times in his lifetime with a noble intention to turn it into a model to be followed by all other counties.
					
					 There began a new history of mountains of treasures in the county under his care. As a result, the Changsong joint meeting of local party and economic officials was held in the county in August 1962.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the spirit of the joint meeting was fully displayed generation after generation. He gave an instruction to the county to raise a new torch for effecting a dramatic turn in the local industry in November 2010.
					
					 The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un has led a drive to face-lift the county as required by the building of a thriving nation so that the year 2012, the 50th anniversary of the joint meeting, may shine as a proud year and a year of new changes in the development of local industry.
					
					 All local industrial establishments in the county have undergone dramatic changes as required by the new century in a matter of little over one year.
					
					 All production processes at the foodstuff factory ranging from feeding of raw materials to packing and forwarding have been automated and its overall processes sterilized to ensure high quality and hygienic safety of products.
					
					 Its textile mill has installed new type machines. Technological updating has made brisk headway at all industrial establishments in the county including paper, furniture and chemical and daily necessities factories.
					
					 There has sprung up a new food processing factory. All its processes computerized, the factory mass-produces processed meat and vegetables, varieties of soft drink, and confectionary.
					
					 A garment factory with big capacity has been built to meet the county's need for school uniforms and solve the issue of clothing by itself.
					
					 The appearance of the county has changed beyond recognition.
					
					 The county erected a mosaic depicting the portraits of the smiling peerlessly great persons. The Changsong revolutionary museum and the county hall of culture have been successfully renovated as centers for the education in the revolutionary history and people's cultural and emotional life.
					
					 The Changsong Restaurant and a noodle restaurant built with Korean style roofs in the center of the county seat add to the beautiful landscape of the township.
					
					 There sprang up the Undok Health Complex with all welfare and service facilities, a children's hall, kindergarten and nursery.
					
					 The library, county people's hospital, sanatorium, commercial and catering network, public buildings and dwelling houses have also been renovated as required by the new century.
					
					 A great success has been made in the land management.
					
					 The eye-opening changes in the county promise a socialist land of bliss where all varieties of consumer goods are mass-produced at the local industrial factories and the people enjoy happiness in their modern houses.

articles.title: US Assailed for Escalating RIMPAC
articles.content:
US Assailed for Escalating RIMPAC
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The RIMPAC joint military maneuvers were reported to finish on Saturday. The military drills led by the U.S. were kicked off in waters off Hawaii on June 29.
					 The U.S. imperialists' fleet staged joint naval maneuvers and counter-naval infiltration drill in coordinated operation with Japan and south Korean puppet forces, driving the situation in the surrounding areas to the brink of a war.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					 The military drills served as a tool of the U.S. reactionary policy for blockading and stifling the socialist countries during the Cold War period by force of arms.
					
					 Today the U.S. has no justification or reason to stage RIMPAC as it was used as a lever for containing the socialist countries in the Cold War period.
					
					 This year's RIMPAC has a series of features of its own.
					
					 Naval forces of 17 countries and regions including the U.S. took part in the military drills in 2010. This year the number of the nations participating in the drills increased to 22.
					
					 What is noteworthy is that the drills between the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces and between the U.S. and Japan were staged in an integral way timed to coincide with the efforts for the formation of the triangular military alliance among the U.S., Japan and south Korean puppet regime.
					
					 In fact, the military games meant the declaration of the creation of the military alliance.
					
					 The recent RIMPAC was an adventurous preliminary war that targeted the DPRK in the light of its period, contents, nature and scale.
					
					 The U.S. war-like forces would be well advised to properly understand their opponent and give up their foolish attempt to browbeat the DPRK and gain something through the escalation of RIMPAC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised for Great Achievements in National Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised for Great Achievements in National Reunification
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday carries a bylined article on the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 The work, made public on August 4, 1997, clarifies the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung for national reunification in a comprehensive and systematic way. It also formulates the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification.
					
					 It also indicates tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification on the basis of the charters.
					
					 The work represents the full conviction and iron will of Kim Jong Il to reunify the country true to the intention of the President to accomplish the cause of the national reunification, the article says, and goes on:
					
					  The work has displayed its vitality and aroused the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad in the effort to achieve the national unity and reunification for the last 15 years for its validity.
					
					 The adoption of the inter-Korean declarations brought about a radical phase in promoting the reconciliation and unity between the north and the south of Korea and ushered in a June 15 era of Korea's reunification for a new history of prosperity.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's devoted efforts and immortal exploits the cause of national reunification with a firm groundwork has become the nationwide cause the victory of which is guaranteed.
					
					 The steadfast will of the dear respected Kim Jong Un to accomplish the national reunification and his idea of great unity of the whole nation encourage all the Koreans in the struggle for hastening the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 The 70 million Koreans waging patriotic and united struggle true to the intentions and behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il would bring, for sure, the rosy future of reunified and prosperous Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: KCNA Terms Reports of US Department of State Ridiculous
articles.content:
KCNA Terms Reports of US Department of State Ridiculous
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Department of State in its "annual report on international religious freedom" and "annual report on terrorism" released on July 30 and 31 again listed the DPRK as "'a state of special concern' without freedom of religion" and "a state not cooperating in combating terrorism".
					 This is a product of extremely sinister political plot of the U.S. to isolate the DPRK in the international arena by deliberately painting the human rights performance in the country as an "institutional issue" and internationalizing it. 
					
					 The U.S. is not entitled to talk about freedom of religion and combat against terrorism because it is the chieftain of international terrorism and the worst abuser of religious belief.
					
					 The history knows countless cases of state-sponsored gruesome terrorism orchestrated by the U.S.
					
					 Not to mention what happened in the last century, the wars launched by the U.S. in various parts of the world in the new century were state-sponsored politically-motivated hideous terrorism and violation of national sovereignty aimed to topple regimes of other countries and establish its order of domination under the signboard of "anti-terrorism."
					
					 Repeated regime changes took place in some countries in North Africa and complicated situation has not been brought under control in various regions. All this is attributable to the U.S. outrageous state-sponsored politically-motivated terrorism.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea spearheaded the attempted operations to blow up statues in the DPRK under the manipulation of the U.S. only to be discovered and frustrated. This was the most typical state-sponsored politically-motivated hideous terrorism, a gross violation of international law.
					
					 Declarations, international law and conventions on combating international terrorism adopted at international meetings including UN General Assembly brand any practices to organize, encourage and agitate the acts of destroying or destabilizing socio-political systems of other countries as grave international crimes.
					
					 The U.S. is also the worst violator of freedom of religion and religious belief.
					
					 The "anti-terror war" launched by the U.S. is a cruel war to abuse human rights as it brutally suppresses freedom of religion and religious belief behind the curtain of "liberal democracy."
					
					 Terming Islam a war-like religion, the U.S. claims that the only way for stamping it out is to "transform all Muslim forces and lead them to Western democracy".
					
					 Pursuant to this brigandish sophism, the U.S. is forcing various countries and regions believing in Islam to fall victim to its "war on terrorism" and seriously infringing upon religious freedom.
					
					 Does the U.S. have the face to take issue with other countries over terrorism and religious issues despite the fact that it is so bitterly condemned by the international community for those crimes?
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the DPRK government to ensure freedom of religious faith and combat all forms of terrorism.
					
					 The U.S. is talking a lot about the improvement of "human rights record" and cooperation in "combating terrorism" while running the whole gamut of moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK, feigning ignorance of its own ill-practices. This reminds one of a guilty party filing suit first and a striking manifestation of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. persistent pursuance of its hostile policy toward the DPRK would compel the DPRK further bolster its nuclear deterrent.

articles.title: KCNA Slashes at US-S. Korea Projected Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
KCNA Slashes at US-S. Korea Projected Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors are mulling staging again provocative Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises despite a strong warning served by the DPRK and the unanimous public condemnation at home and abroad.
					 Such projected saber-rattling is a reckless move as it openly reveals the scenario of the U.S. and south Korea to seize the DPRK by force of arms, and an extremely dangerous attempt to ignite a fresh war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. and the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group claim that the projected war maneuvers are "annual drills" and "ones for examining the posture to cope with a local war to be provoked" by someone.
					
					 This is, however, nothing but brazen-faced sophism to conceal the aggressive nature of the saber-rattling and their true colors as war maniacs.
					
					 This is clearly evidenced by the involvement of huge forces and large quantities of war hardware in those madcap war drills to be staged across south Korea between August 20 and 31.
					
					 At least 500,000 troops including more than 30,000 U.S. forces and over 56,000 troops from various army corps, commands of fleet and flying corps of the puppet army were reported to participate in the drills. Improved nuclear strike means and latest type war hardware which had been introduced into south Korea under the "plan for bolstering combat capability" of the U.S. forces present there are expected to be involved in the exercises.
					
					 They are going to stage such reckless saber-rattling in the sky, ground and seas in a bid to increase the effect of medium and long-range precision strikes and surprise attacks on the strategic bases of the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group adopted a preemptive strike at the DPRK as an orientation of its "military policy towards the north" in 2010. The above-said scenario is also clearly proved by the fact that the puppet group plans to carry out the projected drills according to the supplemented and rounded-off plans for a nuclear war exercises against the north. 
					
					 The south Korea-U.S "Combined Forces Command" has already announced that Ulji Freedom Guardian this year would be "staged under a scenario of an actual war". This suffices to show the danger of the projected military drills.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian is obviously drills for a war of aggression and an escalation of the adventurous nuclear war maneuvers against the DPRK.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never pardon the U.S. and the rat-like Lee group escalating the provocations through madcap war drills, far from making apology for their attempted state-sponsored and politically-motivated hideous terrorism.
					
					 Invaders are fated to meet only death.

articles.title: Japan's Apology Demanded by S. Korean School Youth and Children
articles.content:
Japan's Apology Demanded by S. Korean School Youth and Children
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- South Korean school youth and children held a press conference in Seoul on July 31 at which they demanded the Japanese government make apology and reparation for its crimes related to sexual slavery.
					 They recalled that victims of sexual slaves for the Imperial Japanese Army and members of different organizations hold rallies every Wednesday to denounce the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean women.
					
					 They held that the school youth and children should also turn out in the actions to force Japan to redress the crimes.
					
					 They declared that they would thrust to the Japanese embassy side a list of signatures of students and citizens condemning Japan for the above-said crimes and demanding its apology and reparation.
					
					 They slammed the Japanese government for claiming in its white paper on defence that Tok Islets belong to its territory, declaring that the islets are part of the territory of Korea as proved by historical facts. 
					
					 They also stated that they would conduct diverse actions demanding Japan's apology and reparation and assailing its moves to grab the islets in different areas including Kwanghwamun.

articles.title: US, S. Korean Terrorism against DPRK Assailed by Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
US, S. Korean Terrorism against DPRK Assailed by Overseas Koreans
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Koreans in foreign countries released statements, commentaries, etc. denouncing with towering resentment the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group of traitors for attempting hideous terrorism against the DPRK.
					 The General Association of Koreans in China in its statement said that under the strong backing of the U.S. the south Korean puppet intelligence and plot-breeding bodies formed vicious anti-DPRK terrorist organizations with renegades for carrying out all forms of subversive activities and sabotage and are now infiltrating them into the DPRK in an attempt to commit hideous terrorism against it.
					
					 The Federation of Korean Businessmen in China and the Federation of Korean Youth in China in their statements accused traitor Lee Myung Bak of making no scruple of committing such terrorism as attempting to demolish the statues of the peerlessly great persons, not content with having completely derailed inter-Korean dialogue. 
					
					 The Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification in its commentary noted that the recent attempted hideous terrorism wire-pulled by the U.S. behind the scene gave the lie to its claim that it has no hostile intent on the DPRK.
					
					 The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia in a statement branded Lee as the sworn enemy of the Koreans with whom the Korean nation can never live under the same sky.
					
					 The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. in a statement urged the U.S. to immediately roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK, put an end to its war moves and build a peace-keeping regime. It also demanded the Lee "government" respect the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and opt for national reconciliation and independent and peaceful reunification.

articles.title: Korean Resident in US Congratulates Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Korean Resident in US Congratulates Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Suk, a Korean resident in the U.S., published an article on July 19 congratulating the dear respected Kim Jong Un upon receiving the title of DPRK Marshal. 
					 The publication of a decision on awarding the title of DPRK Marshal to him is an event which pleases all Koreans, the article noted, adding:
					
					 The people in the north are bringing about a leaping advance and changes in their efforts to turn Pyongyang into a world-class city, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Un enjoys absolute trust of the people as he has pursued a state policy, regarding it as his faith to believe in people as in Heaven. He is leading the DPRK to prosperity and a rosy future.

articles.title: Magazine Paektu-Halla Issued
articles.content:
Magazine Paektu-Halla Issued
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released the July issue of its magazine Paektu-Halla.
					 The magazine carried the full text of a congratulatory speech made by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations for celebrating the 66th anniversary of the KCU, illustrated with his photo making a speech there.
					
					 It devoted much space to articles titled "A day of great devotion", "The day of Korean people's victory" and "The general and CNC (7)" which praise the feats of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who devoted their all to the country and the people.
					
					 It gave accounts of a study session on Kim Jong Un's works, a meeting for marking the 12th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, photo and book exhibition, film show and oath-taking meeting held by the general association and organizations under it.
					
					 Given there were accounts of the national festival of science and technology for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, the 14th Pyongyang symposium on medical science of Koreans at home and abroad, events marking the 51st anniversary of the conclusion of the DPRK-China Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance and news that Korean children and students won top prizes and special prizes at the 20th International Juvenile Chopin Piano Contest.
					
					 It also carried news that a spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the general association issued a statement in support of the appeal to Koreans at home and abroad published by the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration and that the general association and organizations under it released statements in denunciation of the anti-DPRK provocations of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet belligerent elements.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Day Marked by British Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Day Marked by British Organization
he Korean Friendship Association issued a statement on July 26 to mark the 59th anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists hurled huge forces including the mercenaries from its satellite countries and poured a fabulous amount of money into the Korean war but couldn't subdue the heroic Korean people.
					
					 The then "UN Forces" Commander Clark expressed his disgraceful feelings, describing him as the first U.S. forces commander who signed the Armistice Agreement (AA) as a loser.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK won victory in the just war against the imperialist invaders under the leadership of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an iron-willed brilliant commander.
					
					 The victory of the Korean people in the war was a fruition of the Juche-oriented war method founded by him.
					
					 It showed that even a small country can defeat any formidable enemy when all the people fight with strong will and fighting spirit, united close around their leader.
					
					 On the occasion of the war victory day of the Korean people, we urge the U.S. to immediately withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea and replace AA with a peace-keeping mechanism at an early date.

articles.title: DPRK's War Victory Day Marked by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
DPRK's War Victory Day Marked by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups and articles on July 27, the 59th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War (Korean War). 
					 The Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud dedicated one whole page to a special write-up under the headline "On the 59th war victory day of the DPRK, the great history of war victory over U.S. imperialism will be ever-lasting" with a picture of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In several articles the paper said that the victory in the three-year war was the victory of the Juche idea, Songun idea which values and loves the people over the idea of invasion and misanthropy. 
					
					 The young DPRK and its people could defeat the U.S. because there were the outstanding military wisdom, strategy and tactics and combat method of Kim Il Sung, it said, elaborating on them. 
					
					 Generalissimo Kim Jong Il inherited the brilliant tradition of patriotism and firmly protected the socialist country and the revolution in the revolutionary war without gunfire for decades, thus laying a precious foundation for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, it said, and went on;
					
					 Today the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is leading the Korean revolution. The army and people of the DPRK advancing to a final victory rallied close behind him in one mind will carry forward the history and tradition of the war victory for all ages. 
					
					 The Vietnamese newspaper Cuu Chien Binh ran an article titled "War Victory Day of the DPRK". It said that the Korean people achieved the war victory, making contribution to defending the world peace and stability and frustrating the wild ambition of the U.S. imperialists. 
					
					 The Nepali newspaper Weekly Mirror carried an article titled "North Korea or U.S., Who Is Devil?" disclosing the barbarous crimes committed by the U.S. imperialists during the Korean War. 
					
					 The Nigerian newspaper Nigerian Observer on July 28 carried an article "Kim Jong Un, Meaning of Panmunjom Inspection" which stressed that no one will dare provoke the DPRK led by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Int'l Organization Denounces S. Korean Anti-Reunification Crime
articles.content:
Int'l Organization Denounces S. Korean Anti-Reunification Crime
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain denounced the south Korean regime for its traitorous and anti-reunification crime. It issued a statement on July 10
					 The statement said that the south Korean regime put behind bar Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, right after he crossed the demarcation line in Panmunjom. 
					
					 Noting that the regime charged him with struggling for peace and reunification of Korea, the statement went on:
					
					 South Korean society is a corrupt and ailing capitalist society though the south Korean regime is advertising "democracy" and "human rights". 
					
					 The world progressive people including youth and students of south Korea know well this and demand an end to the U.S. colonial domination. 
					
					 The corrupt south Korean regime will end soon.

articles.title: UK Organizations Criticize US, S. Korea's Attempted Terrorism
articles.content:
UK Organizations Criticize US, S. Korea's Attempted Terrorism
 Pyongyang, August 4 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association made public a joint statement in denunciation of the U.S. and south Korean regime for their politically motivated state-sponsored terrorism against the DPRK. 
					 The statement said that the despicable attempt of the U.S. and south Korean regime to perpetrate hideous state-sponsored terrorism by use of traitors and other human scum can never be pardoned. 
					
					 The statues of the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and grand monuments in the DPRK reflect boundless reverence of the Korean people for them and the feats of the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners and the war veterans, it said, and went on:
					
					 Demolishing the statues and monuments is a grave challenge to the Korean people and a criminal act to write off the revolutionary tradition and history of Korea. 
					
					 The recently disclosed plot of terrorism was hatched under the sponsorship of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet regime are going to stifle Korean socialism. 
					
					 The DPRK is a country deeply rooted in the unbreakable single-minded unity of the leader, party and people with the great Juche idea as guidelines. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists should know this and get their hands off Korea at once. 
					
					 We call upon followers of the Juche idea, Songun idea to disclose the truth behind terrorist plot of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean regime against the DPRK, and oppose it.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam parte de Pyongyang para visitar a Vietnam y Laos

Kim Yong Nam parte de Pyongyang para visitar a Vietnam y Laos
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, partio el dia 4 de esta capital para realizar una visita oficial y de amistad a la Republica Socialista de Vietnam y la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.

articles.title: Estado de danos por inundacion en Corea
articles.content:
Estado de danos por inundacion en Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- Segun los datos estadisticos, fueron muertos 169 personas, heridos 144 y desaparecidos 400 a causa de las inundaciones por los tifones, chubascos y lluvias torrenciales caidos desde finales de junio pasado hasta el 31 de julio.
					Quedaron destruidas total o parcialmente mas de 8 mil 600 viviendas en varias localidades incluyendo las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur y el Norte, Jagang y Hamgyong del Sur y el Norte. Y anegadas mas de 43 mil 770 casas y mas de 212 mil 200 personas perdieron sus hogares.
					
					Fueron perdidas, enterradas y anegadas mas de 65 mil 280 hectareas de la tierra cultivable, de entre mas de 21 mil 900 hectareas en la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, mas de 23 mil 400 hectareas en la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, mas de 5 mil 670 hectareas en la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur y mas de 7 220 hectareas en la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte.
					
					Fueron destruidos y anegados mas de mil 400 edificios de las instituciones de educacion y salud publica y de las unidades productivas de mas de 26 mil 650 metros cuadrados.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia la escalada de entrenamiento militar Rimpac
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia la escalada de entrenamiento militar Rimpac
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- Terminara hoy el entrenamiento militar conjunto Rimpac que habia sido iniciado el 29 de junio en las aguas perifericas de Hawai bajo la iniciativa de Estados Unidos.
					En cooperacion con Japon y los titeres surcoreanos, la flotilla de buques de guerra de EE.UU. realizo el ejercicio de traslado en el mar y el de bloqueo de infiltracion en el mar llevando la situacion del contorno a la fase a punto de explosion de guerra.
					
					En un articulo individual difundido este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun revela que Rimpac era una herramienta de EE.UU. para cumplir su reaccionaria politica de bloquear y aplastar militarmente a los paises socialistas durante la Guerra Fria, y continua:
					
					Hoy en dia, no existe el pretexto ni el motivo de seguir librando esa maniobra ya que desaparecio el campo socialista de Europa oriental.
					
					La edicion de este ano de Rimpac tuvo una serie de caracteristicas.
					
					Este ano, el numero de los paises participantes crecio a 22 respecto a 17 del ano 2010.
					
					Ademas, tuvo lugar fusionando los entrenamientos militares EE.UU.-Sur de Corea y EE.UU.-Japon en medio de los movimientos practicos para fabricar la alianza militar tripartita.
					
					Por lo tanto, la maniobra significo el anuncio al mundo de la formacion de esa alianza militar trilateral.
					
					Tanto en su periodo de desarrollo como en su contenido, caracter y dimension, Rimpac fue aventurero ensayo de guerra cuyo blanco es precisamente la RPDC.
					
					Las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas deben conocer bien a su rival y dejar su absurda intencion de presionar a alguien y obtener algo con la escalada de Rimpac.

articles.title: ACNC comenta informes anuales del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC comenta informes anuales del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 4 de agosto (ACNC) -- En el "informe anual sobre la libertad de religion internacional" y el "informe anual sobre el terrorismo", publicados los dias 30 y 31 de julio, el Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. volvio a acusar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea calificandola como "pais sin libertad de religion que causa preocupacion especial" y "pais que no coopera en el antiterrorismo".
					Esto es un producto de conspiracion politica para aislar en la escena internacional a la RPDC al internacionalizar como "problema institucional" la situacion de DDHH de la RPDC tras tergiversarla a sus caprichos.
					
					EE.UU. no tiene calificacion para discutir la libertad de la religion y la prevencion del terrorismo.
					
					EE.UU. es el caudillo de terrorismo internacional y estado ejemplar en la violacion de la libertad de religion.
					
					En la historia, se registraron muchos atentados terroristas de Estado, ideados y ejecutados por el imperio.
					
					A citar solo los casos del nuevo siglo, las guerras desatadas por doquier del mundo por EE.UU. fueron flagrantes atentados terroristas politicos y violaciones de derechos estatales de los paises agredidos. El objetivo de esas guerras "antiterroristas" estuvo en derrocar el regimen de los Estados soberanos y establecer el orden de dominacion al estilo norteamericano.
					
					Como resultado, se cambiaron uno tras otro los regimenes de algunos paises de Africa del Norte y sigue siendo complicada la situacion de otras zonas.
					
					El recien revelado atentado de destruccion de las estatuas de bronce erigidas en la RPDC, que impulsaba la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak bajo el control trasero de EE.UU., es el caso mas representativo del terrorismo politico de Estado.
					
					Las declaraciones, las leyes y los convenios internacionales sobre las medidas para la eliminacion  del terrorismo internacional, aprobados en la Asamblea General y otras reuniones internacionales, estipulan como serio crimen la organizacion, el fomento y la agitacion de los actos destinados a destruir o desestabilizar el sistema sociopolitico de otros paises.
					
					EE.UU. viola flagrantemente la libertad de la religion.
					
					La "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. acaba con los DDHH violando flagrantemente la libertad de religion y cultos detras del vistoso cartel de "democracia liberal".
					
					Es precisamente EE.UU. el que definio el Islam como religion belicosa y dijo que el unico remedio para eliminarlo es "reformar todas las fuerzas islamicas y conducirlas a la senda de democracia occidental".
					
					Segun esta doctrina de bandido, varios paises y regiones del mundo islamico se convierten en las victimas de la "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU.
					
					Debido a sus abiertos actos profanos, EE.UU. es criticado por la sociedad internacional.
					
					Asegurar la libertad de la religion y rechazar todas las formas de terrorismo son la invariable posicion del gobierno de la RPDC.
					
					Haciendo vista gorda de esa actitud de la RPDC, EE.UU., que hace todo lo posible para aislar y asfixiar a la primera, habla tanto con gran hipocresia del mejoramiento de la situacion de "DDHH" y la cooperacion en el "antiterrorismo". 
					
					Si el imperio continua con su politica hostil a la RPDC, crecera mas el disuasivo nuclear de esta.
